title: Verify V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API for the patron account when correct patron id provided
custom_preconds:
Create multiple Renewal Groups & payment plans in baseball supplier
Create multiple events & Packages and distribute the above created Renewal groups to them.
Set application property online.renewals.get.checkout.endpoint.enabled to true 
Create the below transactions (both event & Package) for a patron using the POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout endpoint
Reservation order
Receivable order with PENDING_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with PENDING_MANUAL_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with ASSIGNED_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with FULLY_PAID

custom_steps_separated.expected: Tool should be launched successfully
Method should be selected as GET
Header and authorization details should be filled successfully
Patron Id should be filled successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
Run V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API for the patron account
with the example endpoint  https://localhost:18443/api/v2/carts/renew/{{cartid}}/checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should be able to run the request

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify the response obtained and check the new elements/attributes
custom_steps_separated.expected: All RenewalOrderCategories should be included in the response

title: Verify V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API for the patron account when blank patron id provided
custom_preconds:
Create multiple Renewal Groups & payment plans in baseball supplier
Create multiple events & Packages and distribute the above created Renewal groups to them.
Set application property online.renewals.get.checkout.endpoint.enabled to true
Create the below transactions (both event & Package) for a patron Create the below transactions (both event & Package) for a patron using the POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout endpoint
Reservation order
Receivable order with PENDING_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with PENDING_MANUAL_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with ASSIGNED_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with FULLY_PAID

custom_steps_separated.expected: Tool should be launched successfully
Method should be selected as GET
Header and authorization details should be filled successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter a space in the patron-id in "x-patron-account-id-claim" header
custom_steps_separated.expected: Patron Id should be updated to a blank on the header

custom_steps_separated.content:
Run V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API for the patron account
with the example endpoint https://localhost:18443/api/v2/carts/renew/{{cartid}}/checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should be able to run the request
An error message should be displayed

title: Verify V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API response when Property is disabled at the time the POST/checkout call is made,
custom_preconds:
Create multiple Renewal Groups & payment plans in baseball supplier
Create multiple events & Packages and distribute the above created Renewal groups to them.
Set application property online.renewals.get.checkout.endpoint.enabled to false 
Create the below transactions (both event & Package) for a patron using V2 API's 
Reservation order
Receivable order with PENDING_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with PENDING_MANUAL_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with ASSIGNED_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with FULLY_PAID

custom_steps_separated.content: Set application property set in preconditions above to true
custom_steps_separated.expected: The property should be set
Tool should be launched successfully
Method should be selected as GET
Header and authorization details should be filled successfully
Patron Id should be filled successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
Run V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API for the patron account
with the example endpoint  https://localhost:18443/api/v2/carts/renew/{{cartid}}/checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should be able to run the request

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify the response obtained and check the response matches the response of the POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout detailed in preconditions above
custom_steps_separated.expected: The response should show an 404 error

custom_steps_separated.expected: The response should match the response of the POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout call

title: Verify  GET endpoint can be called up to 10 minutes after the successful POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout endpoint is called
custom_preconds:
Create multiple Renewal Groups & payment plans in baseball supplier
Create multiple events & Packages and distribute the above created Renewal groups to them.
Set application property online.renewals.get.checkout.endpoint.enabled to true 
Create the below transactions (both event & Package) for a patron using V2 API's 
Reservation order
Receivable order with PENDING_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with PENDING_MANUAL_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with ASSIGNED_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
Receivable order with FULLY_PAID

custom_steps_separated.expected: Tool should be launched successfully
Method should be selected as GET
Header and authorization details should be filled successfully
Patron Id should be filled successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
Run V2 GetCheckoutConfirmation API for the patron account
with the example endpoint  https://localhost:18443/api/v2/carts/renew/{{cartid}}/checkout within 10 mins of making the POST call in the preconditions above
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should be able to run the request

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify the response obtained and check the response matches the response of the POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout detailed in preconditions above
custom_steps_separated.expected: The response should match the response of the POST /renew/{cartId}/checkout call
